articles.description: Jorge Masvidal must fight Kamaru Usman at UFC 251 without a key cornerman in Mike Brown.
articles.content: Jorge Masvidal must fight Kamaru Usman at UFC 251 without a key cornerman in Mike Brown.

articles.author: Matt Maltby
articles.title: Usain Bolt unveils baby daughter's name as Olympic icon shares adorable pictures - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Olympic hero and his partner have so far kept the name secret, after Jamaican prime minister Andrew Holness announced the news of the birth seven weeks ago
articles.content:
Usain Bolt has finally revealed the name of his adorable daughter after long-term partner Kasi Bennett gave birth to their baby in May.
